snippet: The average price of regular gasoline nationwide has dropped another 25 cents a gallon in the past two weeks, to $2.47....

headline.print_headline: Survey: US Gas Prices Fall 25 Cents Per Gallon
headline.main: Survey: US Gas Prices Fall 25 Cents Per Gallon

lead_paragraph: The average price of regular gasoline nationwide has dropped another 25 cents a gallon in the past two weeks, to $2.47.
